alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:28PM CDT until May 07 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Union County in south central Iowa... Northeastern Adams County in southwestern Iowa... Southern Adair County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Orient, or 9 miles south of Greenfield, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Orient around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Green Valley Lake, Green Valley Lake State Park and Creston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
